dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Mortal, you dare to stand before The Shadow King?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your motives.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My motives are beyond your feeble comprehension. Nonetheless, ask your question.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Why do you bring darkness and despair to this land?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness and despair are the very essence of my being. Your words mean nothing to me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Can't we find a way to coexist peacefully?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is a fleeting illusion, especially in my presence. Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand against you and defend this land!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance. Amusing. Prepare to face your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What do you desire from the inhabitants of this realm?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Desire? I desire nothing but the eternal darkness that awaits all. What about you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to protect them from your tyranny!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tyranny? Mortal, you do not yet understand the true extent of power. An inevitable confrontation awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will do whatever it takes to stop you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, indeed. Let us see if your actions match your empty words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Why do you bring chaos and destruction?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Chaos and destruction are the natural order of things. Your resistance is futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not let you harm this world any longer!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harm? You misunderstand. I bring balance through chaos, whether you accept it or not.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stop you at all costs!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Costs? Careful, mortal, for the cost might be more than you are willing to pay.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your reign of terror ends now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Terror? Oh, you have yet to witness true terror. Brace yourself for what comes next.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there no other way but destruction?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Destruction is the only path that leads to the true realization of power. Do you understand?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will find a way to stop you without resorting to violence!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Naive fool. Violence is the language of my kind. Prepare for its wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even if I have to fight, I will not let you win!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Winning and losing are trivial matters. The only certainty is the impending clash between us.
